TEXT.P: The table at left shows the global fish capture in millions of tons since 1950. This data set was prepared by the UN Food and Agriculture Organization using actual and estimated data.
Press "Plot the Data" to draw a graph of this data set.
Global fish captures have increased dramatically since the middle of last century. This is due to increasing use of technology in fishing, as well as to increased demand due to increased populations.
Answer question 1 in the assignment, then proceed to Step 2.
